title: 07/23/2021 - HOUR 2 - NFL, Rodgers

description:
The NFL wants the league to get vaccinated, and they are right in doing so

Colin plays buy, sell, or hold with Chris Broussard

More on the drama between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers


Guest: Chris Broussard
